# StreamVox Pro

> Real-Time AI Subtitles & Translation for Windows.

## What is StreamVox?

StreamVox is an AI-powered Windows application that provides instant, real-time translated subtitles for any audio on your PC. It works with video calls, movies, anime, games, phone calls, and streaming content.

## Primary Use Cases

### 1. Calls & Meetings
Translate live conversations in Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Skype, or Discord. Follow international colleagues in your own language while they speak.

### 2. Anime & Japanese Content
Watch raw anime, Japanese streams, or any content in Japanese and get real-time translated subtitles. No need to wait for fansubs. Works with Crunchyroll, Netflix, YouTube, and any video player.

### 3. Gaming & Streaming
Get real-time subtitles for in-game voice chat, Japanese visual novels, and international Twitch streams. Perfect for multiplayer games with voice chat in other languages.

### 4. Mobile Call Translation
Connect iPhone or Android to Windows via Microsoft Phone Link. See live subtitles for phone calls directly on your PC screen.

### 5. Accessibility
Live on-screen subtitles help people who have difficulty hearing speech. Makes calls, meetings, and videos easier to follow.

## Key Features

- **Low Latency AI Translation**: Context-aware real-time translation with minimal delay
- **Universal Overlay**: Customizable floating subtitle window (font size 12-72px, text colors, opacity) stays on top of any app
- **Multiple Display Modes (NEW in v1.3.0)**: Toggle between Line-by-Line (perfect for gaming/language practice) and Paragraph Mode (Pro teleprompter style).
- **Per-App Audio Capture**: Isolate specific apps like Zoom, Teams, or Discord for cleaner translation
- **Bidirectional Translation**: Translates both system audio (what you hear) and microphone (what you say)
- **47+ Input Languages (NEW in v1.3.0)**: Arabic, Hindi, Turkish, Polish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Japanese, English, Russian, German, Spanish, French, Chinese, Korean, and 30+ more.
- **49 Translation Target Languages**: Powered by state-of-the-art AI.
- **Multilingual Interface**: App UI available in 12 languages (English, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, German, French, Russian, Turkish, Italian, Polish, Korean)
- **Quick Info Menu**: Leave a review, contact support, or reach out for partnerships right from the main window.
- **Privacy Focused**: Audio processed in real-time, never stored on servers
- **Dark Mode UI**: Modern interface optimized for Windows 11

## Pricing

- **StreamVox Free**: 20 minutes per day, no credit card required
- **StreamVox Pro**: $5.99/month, unlimited translation time

- **Platforms**: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit)
- **Technology**: Native Windows app with AI cloud backend

## Target Audiences

- **Anime & Media Fans**: Watch raw Japanese content or foreign movies without waiting for subs.
- **Gamers**: Play Japanese visual novels or communicate in international voice chats.
- **Business Professionals**: Follow international meetings (Zoom, Teams) and webinars.
- **Language Learners**: Improve comprehension with real-time translation assistance.
- **Hard-of-Hearing Users**: Use live on-screen subtitles for better accessibility.
- **Online Students & Researchers**: Understand educational content and research lectures in foreign languages.
- **Expats & Global Citizens**: Stay informed by watching local news or TV in a foreign country.

## Comparison

StreamVox vs alternatives:
- Unlike browser extensions, StreamVox works with ANY audio source on Windows
- Unlike Otter.ai, StreamVox provides real-time translation, not just transcription
- Unlike Google Translate, StreamVox runs in an overlay without switching apps
- Unlike waiting for fansubs, StreamVox translates anime instantly

## FAQ

Q: Does StreamVox work with anime?
A: Yes! Perfect for watching raw anime with real-time Japanese to English subtitles.

Q: Can I use it for Zoom calls?
A: Yes, works with Zoom, Teams, Discord, and any communication app.

Q: Is my audio stored?
A: No, audio is processed in real-time and never stored.

Q: What languages are supported?
A: 10+ languages including Japanese, English, Russian, German, Spanish, French, Chinese, Korean, Portuguese, Italian.
